eu.mf2c.stfc.rest

Class CertAuthsRestService

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.mf2c.stfc.rest.CertAuthsRestService

  • @Path(value="/{ca}")
public class CertAuthsRestService
extends Object
    The entry point to the mF2C cloud certificate authorities.

    author Shirley Crompton email shirley.crompton@stfc.ac.uk org Data Science and Technology Group, UKRI Science and Technology Council Created 11 Dec 2018

    • Method Detail

      • doGet

        @GET
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response doGet(@PathParam(value="ca")
                                                                             String ca)
        Handle HTTP Get method. A default message is returned. This method is included just for completeness.

        Parameters:
        ca - The certificate authority resource path element.
        Returns:
        A plain text message about the correct way to call the CA service.

      • doPost

        @POST
 @Consumes(value="text/plain")
 @Produces(value="text/plain")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response doPost(String content,
                                                                                                               @PathParam(value="ca")
                                                                                                               String ca)
        Handle HTTP Post method. If the target resource is:
        • a trusted CA: the client should post a Common Name in plain text and the service would return an X509certificate and the associated PrivateKey. The two objects are concatenated together and written out in PEM format. Note that the Common Name is limited to 64 chars.
        • an untrusted CA: the client should post a PKCS10CertificationRequest. The service would return an X509certificate in PEM format.

        Parameters:
        content - either a Common Name or a PKCS10CertificationRequest
        ca - the target Certificate Authority resource path element.
        Returns:
        an X509certificate in PEM format and optionally the associated PrivateKey.
